ch.supertomcat.bh.queue

Interface IDownloadQueueManagerListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Queue, SystemTrayTool

    public interface IDownloadQueueManagerListener
    Interface of QueueData to let listeners know when downloads-slots where changed or the count of downloaded files or bytes has changed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Changes of the count of downloaded files since application started
      void totalDownloadRateCalculated(double downloadRate)

                int openSlots,
                int maxSlots)
        Download-Slots has changed.
        Parameters:
        queue - Amount of downloads in the queue
        openSlots - Free download-slots
        maxSlots - Maximum download-slots
